name: Age of Reforging:The Freelands
description:
The Freelands, lands of thieves, speculators, and adventurers. People never stop coming here for wealth and fame, but most turned into white bones. Only those who are favored by the goddess of fate can get a foothold here and get what they want, while all this is built on the loss of others ......

Explore

- Adventure in the vast FreeLands, pursue wealth, power and prestige, and become the chosen one of the Goddess of Fate.
- Be a astute merchant and travel between 5 towns and 8 villages to earn profits.
- Explore 8 distinct ecological environments such as forests, swamps, deserts, mountains, and plateaus..., and reveal the secrets and stories within.
- March towards dangerous dungeons and ancient ruins to discover the unique treasures hidden within.

Survival

- Surviving in the Freelands is no easy task, with its brutal bandits, fierce beasts, and mythical and terrifying monsters.
- Hunger and fatigue will also put your party in danger.
- Never let your guard down, even when setting up camp at night!

Battle

- Defeat your opponents in real-time combat. In the mean while, you can pause time at any time to give orders to your party members.
- The unique AI Tactics Editor can often be a great help and turn the odds in your favor while in danger.。

Growth

- Choose from a number of different origins. Do you want to be born with the gift of magic? Or be a notorious bandit? Or a mercenary who was briefly disillusioned?
- Deeply customize your character, allocate your attribute points, and gain a variety of traits in your adventures.
- Mix and match 7 weapon skills, over 10 different styles of combat skills, and 8 types of magic skills to create your own unique class.
- Gradually expand your team and seek like-minded partners who can come from all over the Freelands!

Choose

- Get involved in stories that take place all over the Freelands. You need to make hard choices and decide carefully while these will lead the land to different fates ......
- Do you want to punish evil and promote good or greed and plunder? It's all up to you! Civilians and guards can also become the stepping stones on your way to success!
